$ echo "KK\_GATLING\_GUN(AI=1)" >> /Hill/Defenses

$ echo "}" >> /Hill/Defenses

$ echo "my bashized hill."

my bashized hill.

$ |

I accidentally create a black hole. Everything is sucked in.
my hill.
I flip the hill upside down and inhabit the half that used to be the bottom. My hill.

I make a black hole and have a ship orbiting inside the event horizon, but with a FTL drive keeping it aloft. Then the hill is sucked in, and I have the hill.

My hill. Also in the black hole is the universe's military and all weapons. All with aimbots and wallhacks.

\*Ignore this post.\*
